title: AI Readiness Diagnostic
description: Two-week diagnostic covering workflows, decision latency, risk posture, and data quality.

title: Workflow & Decision Inventory
description: Map high-impact workflows, owners, systems of record, and decision bottlenecks.

title: AI Governance & Operating Model
description: Define risk controls, audit trails, and escalation routes for human-in-the-loop delivery.

title: SaaS Dependency & Internalization Strategy
description: Assess external AI vendors, cost exposure, and internalization paths for critical workflows.

title: Implementation Pilot
description: Design and run a controlled pilot with governance guardrails and measurable outcomes.
